ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(AND(AND( Professionalism__c > 0, Professionalism__c < 11), AND( Soft_Skill_Confidence__c > 0, Soft_Skill_Confidence__c < 11), AND( Soft_Skill_Fluency__c > 0, Soft_Skill_Fluency__c < 11), AND( Technical_Accuracy__c > 0, Technical_Accuracy__c < 11), AND( Technical_Fluency__c > 0, Technical_Fluency__c < 11)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Skill ratings must be a number between 1 and 10
